sentences.en: Conclusion Be propitious to achieve standardization and systematization nursing cost management.
sentences.cn: 结论:构建护理成本核算体系有利于实现护理成本管理标准化、系统化、规范化.

sentences.en: He awaited the propitious moment with the crafty patience of the sick.
sentences.cn: 他怀着病人所特有的那种阴郁的耐心等待着有利的时机.

sentences.en: It was not a propitious time to start a new business.
sentences.cn: 那不是营业开张的吉时佳日。

sentences.en: It was not a propitious time to start a new business.
People like to hear propitious sentences.
sentences.cn: 人们都喜欢听吉利的话.

sentences.en: Propitious Knot: The original meanings are love and devotion.
sentences.cn: 吉祥结吉祥结较为原初的意义象征爱情和献身.

sentences.en: Such result will be propitious to the invasion of alterniflora.
sentences.cn: 而互花米草是风媒植物,所以这样的结果会更加有利于它的成功入侵.

sentences.en: The circumstances were not propitious for further expansion of the company.
sentences.cn: 这些情况不利于公司的进一步发展.

sentences.en: The cool days during this week are propitious for out trip.
sentences.cn: 这种凉爽的天气对我们的行程很有好处.

sentences.en: The farmers are blessing propitious winds and rains.
sentences.cn: 农民们正在祈求风调雨顺.

sentences.en: The omens for the game are still not propitious.
The present moment was peculiarly propitious for rebellion.
sentences.cn: 目前这一时刻对于叛变特别有利.

sentences.en: They should wait for the most propitious moment between now and the next election.
sentences.cn: 他们应等待从现在到下次选举之间的最有利时机。

trans.tran_cn: 有利的，吉祥的，吉利的，合适的
trans.tran_en: good and likely to bring good results
